entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
